descriptionHtml:
Started a new game, and found the face pretty good, so I wanted to share it.

File contains 2 presets, one with a small ponytail (which looks nice, but alas, the ponytail is tied too close to the neck, so it clips through pretty much any armor and whatever hangs on your back), and one jaw-length hair (which looks fairly nice even in heavy armor with a neck guard, and most importantly, doesn't clip through anything madly).

Requires:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]Ningheim race[/url]
Optional to look the same:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?]KS HDT hairdos[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35373/?]Cloudy Eyes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279/?]Northborn Scars [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29977/?]HD vanilla warpaint[/url]
author: peregrine111
